reviews.review: 为什么玩着玩着就老是没响应游戏就消失了？谁拯救下我！！

No descubro nada al decir que el Half life marcó una época en los videojuegos.
Excelente ambientación, buena dificultad, un entorno bien logrado, todo esto sumado a una buena jugabilidad logran tener atrapado al jugador horas y horas en esta historia.
5/5, sin dudas la mejor saga de videojuegos que se ha realizado.
Felices 20 años HL

[h1] Half-Life [/h1] 
[h1] Nostalgia Pura [/h1]

[b]Para começar vamos comentar sobre os gráficos.[/b]

[b] Não podemos comparar com os gráficos de hoje, mas para época 1998 foi um belo avanço.[/b]

[b]A ideia do jogo estava muito a frente do seu tempo, mostrando não ser só mais um jogo de atirar e passar de níveis.[/b]

[b] A história é bem objetiva, você é um cientista chamado Gordon Freeman que depois de ocorrer o acidente no laboratório Black Mesa, está tentando fugir de lá.[/b]

[b]Mas começam aparecer muitos obstáculos em seu caminho, então prepare-se para se aventurar.[/b]

[b] Os inimigos são bem variados, então você vai passar por vários desafios e batalhas épicas.[/b]

[b]Ele pode ser considerado um jogo relativamente longo.[/b]

[b]Para você, marinheiro de primeira viagem que nunca jogou Half Life.[/b]

[b]Recomendo fortemente você conhecer, sem duvidas Half life é um enorme clássico que deve ser conhecido por todos.[/b]

[b]Caso tenha um problema de tela, de uma passadinha neste guia.[/b]

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2147733274

Eu nunca tinha jogado Half Life por mais que alguns escassos minutos. Ou seja, nunca tinha jogado de fato. Agora com duas horas e meia de jogo deu pra entender porque o game tem qualificações extremamente positivas. Jogo intensamente fluído e viciante. Além disso, se não fosse por esse jogo, a Valve não teria chegado ao topo do mundo dos games e talvez, assim, a plataforma Steam sequer existiria.  

Por tudo o que representa Half Life, eis aí um verdadeiro clássico dos games.

★★★★★ Superb!

[h1]Legendary game[/h1]

People who don't know this game doesn't deserve to call themself as gamers!
Still an awsome game, even after 20 full years, no doubt about it

Лютое говнище с графронием уровня 1998 года(ноября, если что). В одной только комнате полигонов находиться в количестве сторон куба. Движок - GoldSource, серьёзно, кто ещё делает игры на таком устаревшем софте. Огромное количество модификаций, что, естественно, показывает несостоятельность сюжетной и геймплейной составляющей. А звуки , качество звуков на на богоподобном уровне! В прямом смысле - никакой.Я искренне не понимаю, какой отбитый дегенеранитивный дегенерат-имбицил способен играть, а что ещё хуже, писать хорошие отзывы к этой сырой пострелушке в эру технологического прогресса. Просто ужас.
[b]Плюсы:[/b]
Этой игре повезло оказаться в величайшей игровой площадку Steam. (реально пиздатая площадка, отвечаю).
[b]Минусы:[/b]
[spoiler]Минусов слишком много. Я не стану их писать все, так как считаю, что все вместе взятые дата-центры и хранилища мира не смогут хранить такие объемы информации, да и зачем, если со всеми минусами можно ознакомиться скачав игру, что я крайне не рекомендую.[/spoiler]

For its time very good game.

Одним словом - классика.
Приобрел не так давно, чтобы была возможность посмотреть любительские модификации в Стиме. Но и дабы освежить память - решил перепройти. Игра для того времени выглядит шикарно. Есть не плохой сюжет - и он как говориться, не замысловат. Беги - стреляй - выживай.
Что удивило - это наличие в тех, или иных местах багов. То тележка не едет, если в один угол в движении запрыгнуть. То лопасть вентилятора убивает за два метра до нее. Но это нормально. Это уже простительно.
Как итог - вспомнил детство, выпустил пар, убивая злосчастных хэдкрабов и успел не раз прокатиться на барнаклах. 
Рекомендую к ознакомлению!

Homie, I am not black. This game is good.

A milestone in the FPS genre.

I thought it would be a great idea to replay Half Life for its 20th anniversary, after so many years. And oh boy, I stopped playing Battlefield V, Assassin's Creed and all the other stuff I have in order to play this thoroughly.

 it's quite remarkable how this game still manages to be a great deal after two decades. It was the very first example of a true, fine immersion in a fps, which at that time were all about space stations, evil creatures, over the top characters and magical, floating power ups. Everything has a sense here: object placement, AI behaviour, the level design, and the natural flow of events throughout the game. The game unfolds through the glasses of the not so loquacious Gordon Freeman, showing both a new era for fps games at that time while mirroring some old inheritance like the uncomfortable platforming and some questionable design choices towards the end. And yes, the only thing I must really complain about is that at the final part of the game, especially the Xen part, the game loses a little bit of... steam.

A classic. Half-Life was and is still one of the best FPS ever Well nowadays the graphics are outdated, but gameplay is still very good comparing to triple A games which are simply a mess of microtransactions. Even if you have played Black Mesa, which if you don't know, is an Half-Life Remake with the new Half-Life 2 Engine/Source, it's actually still worth playing. Well, there are some bugs because of it's age, but they are rare. I don't know what else to write here, but one thing to say, it's worth the money.

This game sucks ass.  You glide around shitty textures with an arsenal of weapons that do absolutely no damage.  Enemies drain your life with 2 bullets, while you hopelessly dump clip after clip into them, searching for the next health station which only show up every fucking 4 hours.  This game is overhyped dogshit.  Don't play unless it's 1998 and you have no senses.  Fuck this game.  I can't believe I even payed $0.12 for every game in this series.

Valve's 1998 Half-Life its an amazing game. It takes to journey through depths of Black Mesa Research Facilities (not only) and puts you in a H.E.V suit of Gordon Freeman who have to survive in a "warzone" which Black Mesa became....game being 20 years old it shows its age in graphics (which is obvious) but in terms of story telling its unravell. This game is so good that its sequel realesed in 2004 is worse than '98 even if sequel got a downride amazing physics. In my opinion every gamer should play it at least once in their live.

P.S After you're done with original...i recomend go and download Brutal Half-Life <---with this shooting in HL games will never be better

OLD BUT GOLD.

My first time playing Half-Life is twenty years after it's release. I've played source games before so I knew what to expect visually and mechanically but I didn't expect such a great playthrough experience. I didn't want to stop playing and even when I did, I was thinking about how to beat the area I was currently stuck on.

At the time of writing this review, I have completed Half Life on every difficulty. The game is a great game, especially on medium, but... oh man, it becomes terrible on hard. Some people may call me a big baby for saying that, but it's true. Very true.
 
Cause I hope you enjoy unfair challenges if you decide to play on hard. The battle that Gman would give you if you don't take the actual ending? This- this is this battle. I hope you like Snarks that deal 10 damage per bite, along with your armor practically meaning nothing, along with Vorts that take little to no time to charge, and deal probably around 30 damage on hit. Fun. Much like Yoshi's Island, I can say this game is great- a true classic, but if you go for 100% (In Half-Life's case, Hard difficulty), you're gonna hate it.
good

Un muy buen videojuego, y ahora que lo juegue, un autentico clasico de los 90 en cuanto a FPS se refiere, quisas envejecio algo mal en el aspecto de la IA (sobretodo la aliada, la cual, es absurda, claro que no espero algo super bueno, ya que seria narrativamente malo, si no algo intermedio, pero no), algunos enemigos son algo repetidos, y el jefe final es decente pero algo simplon. Y los npc no son muy buenos, solo son maquinas que te ayudan a pasar de un lado a otro, no tienen personalidad, aunque en su epoca, puede haber tenido sentido. Aunque que si algunos npc mueran y hagan que falle la mision, se siente bastante realista y tiene mucho sentido. Hay buena variedad de armas, tanto humanas como alies. La dificultad esta bien, y la musica aunque escasea, la que hay es competente aunque no muy memorable. La ambientacion es genial y la variedad de situaciones tambien. Una gran saga que merece su tercera entrega, pero de ahi, ya no sabemos cuandro saldra. En fin. 8/10
